entry.tran: (通常指因生病发烧而)谵妄的，神志不清的，说胡话的
entry.def: Someone who is delirious is unable to think or speak in a sensible and reasonable way, usually because they are very ill and have a fever.

example.ex: I was delirious and blacked out several times.
example.tran: 我神志不清，昏迷了好几次。

entry.tran: 欣喜若狂的;极度兴奋的
entry.def: Someone who is delirious is extremely excited and happy.

example.ex: His tax-cutting pledge brought a delirious crowd to their feet...
example.tran: 他减税的承诺让亢奋的人群欢呼雀跃起来。

means.word_mean: 2. marked by uncontrolled excitement or emotion;
